yellowBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Yellow Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive ones.  Select any Arrow key to grab the balloon and start dragging. Select Tab for next item. Select question mark for keyboard help.

greenBalloon.descriptionPattern.value: Green Balloon has a {0} charge, {1} more negative charges than positive ones.  Select any Arrow key to grab the balloon and start dragging. Select Tab for next item. Select question mark for keyboard help.

screen.description.value: In the Play Area, there are one or two balloons, a sweater and a removable wall. Each object shows negative and positive charges. Charges are shown in pairs. Below the Play Area, a Control Panel allows you to add and remove objects, adjust charge views and reset the entire experiment. Currently, the sweater and wall have many pairs of charges, the balloon, just a few. Tab to navigate between objects. Select question mark for keyboard help.

screen.label.value: The scene for Balloons and Static Electricity

sweater.descriptionPattern.value: The sweater has a {0} charge, with {1} more positive charges than negative ones.

sweater.noMoreCharges.value: No more charges remaining on sweater

wall.chargeNeutralityDescription.value: The wall has a neutral charge, no more positive charges than negative ones.

wall.chargeDisplacementDescriptionPatter.value: Negative charges in the wall {0} balloon in a {1} arch.

wallButton.description.value: Toggle to conduct experiments with or without the wall.

chargeSettings.description.value: Select how you want to see or hear the charges.

balloonSettings.description.value: Toggle to conduct experiments with two balloons or just one.

resetBalloons.descriptionPattern.value: Select to {0} to initial position and an uncharged state.

keyboardHelp.interactions.arrowKeys.value: Arrow Keys: Grabs and moves balloon in any direction.

keyboardHelp.interactions.spacebarContro.value: Spacebar or Control plus Enter: Releases balloon.

keyboardHelp.interactions.shiftPlusArrow.value: Shift plus Arrow Key: Grabs and Moves balloon with bigger steps.

keyboardHelp.hotKeys.balloonJumpToSweate.value: J plus S: Jumps to edge of Sweater.

keyboardHelp.hotKeys.balloonJumpToWall.value: J plus W: Jumps to Wall.

keyboardHelp.hotKeys.balloonJumpToNearWa.value: J plus N: Jumps to Near Wall.

keyboardHelp.hotKeys.balloonJumpToMiddle.value: J plus M: Jumps to Middle of Play Area.

keyboardHelp.navigation.tab.value: Tab key: Goes to next focusable item.
